title: Runner Alexi Pappas on mental health, marathons, and mentors
description:
Alexi Pappas an award-winning filmmaker and author who also is aiming to run the marathon at Tokyo 2020 for Greece.

Since becoming the Olympian and breaking the Greek national record in the 10,000m at Rio 2016, she became clinically depressed.

She speak to the Olympic Channel Podcast about what worked for her mental health, an idea for how to improve marathon events, and why it's never too late to find a mentor.
